com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.configuration.scan

Class EddystoneScanContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.configuration.scan.EddystoneScanContext

  • public final class EddystoneScanContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Eddystone scan context provides describes criteria according to which the Android device scans Eddystone devices. The context provides plenty of customizations including: searching by namespaces, filters for UID, URL and TLM advertising packets, selection of desired event types (for more information see EventType), rssi signal manipulation, sorting devices by their distance from Android device, notifying events with updated device with specific interval

      • getTriggerFrameTypes

        public java.util.Collection<EddystoneFrameType> getTriggerFrameTypes()
        Gets trigger frame types. The trigger frame types specify with which frame types received at least the Eddystone device should be notified. The reuired frame type is EddystoneFrameType.UID. The all possible combinations include: Eddystone device with EddystoneFrameType.UID, Eddystone device with EddystoneFrameType.UID and EddystoneFrameType.URL, Eddystone device with EddystoneFrameType.UID and EddystoneFrameType.TLM, Eddystone device with EddystoneFrameType.UID, EddystoneFrameType.URL and EddystoneFrameType.TLM.
        Returns:
        the trigger frame types
